property.name: sun.cpu.isalist
property.value: pentium_pro+mmx pentium_pro pentium+mmx pentium i486 i386 i86

testcase.name: testSave

error.message:
### Error updating database. Cause: java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00904: "UNION_ID": 标识符无效
### The error may involve com.xiu.mobile.wechat.web.dao.BindingCfgDao.saveBindingCfg-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: INSERT INTO X_WECHAT_BINDING_CFG(ID,XIU_ACCOUNT,XIU_PASSWORD,OPEN_ID,CREATE_DATE,XIU_MODE,USER_ID,LOGON_NAME,UNION_ID) VALUES(X_WECHAT_SEQ.nextval,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ### Cause: java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00904: "UNION_ID": 标识符无效
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00904: "UNION_ID": 标识符无效
